Name: Hyper Scuffle
About the game: Hyper Scuffle is a decidedly bizarre 2D fighting game with fluid gameplay and a minimalist style. Each of its nine fighters is designed to be easy to understand, but complicated to master. Play against up to 4 players in local or online multiplayer! Features: nine fighters, each with their own unique abilities and play styles a simple, vibrant art style inspired by early arcade games interesting fighting mechanics not present in other games (such as screen wrapping and infinite player mobility) three gamemodes: Classic, Contest, and Spectrum XBox controller support local, LAN, and online multiplayer 15 subjectively gorgeous maps AI for every fighter more than 17 bugs and errors to discover created by one guy over ~300 hours costs over 50% less than a cup of coffee could probably run on a potato
Meta Title: Hyper Scuffle: Jan 7, 2019, JP McHargue and Full Overview
Meta Description: Looking for information on Hyper Scuffle? Check out the release date (Jan 7, 2019), developer insights from JP McHargue, and a complete game summary.
